data.Title: Google Search Console Performance Reports Fixed After Outage
data.Description: Google Search Console Performance reports are now all caught up after a long significant delay.

data.Title: Google Search Console Delays Not Related to Algorithm Update
data.Description: The Search Console delays are not a sign of an unconfirmed Google search core ranking update says @johnmu

data.Title: Google Updates Image SEO Best Practices
data.Description: Google updated its image SEO best practices "Use HTML image elements to embed images" section

data.Title: Google Tests Wider Search Bar, Possibly for Longer Queries
data.Description: Google Search testing a longer/wider search bar (for longer queries?)

data.Title: Cloudflare Launches Tool to Block AI Crawlers for Free
data.Description: Cloudflare launches a tool that aims to block bots from scraping websites for AI training data, available free for all customers.

data.Title: Google's Gary Illyes Explains Why Negative SEO Doesn't Work
data.Description: Gary Illyes' reason for why negative SEO links don't work matches what link builders have known for 20 years

data.Title: Google's Take on Competing with Reddit and Big Brands
data.Description: Google's Gary Illyes shares his thoughts on how small sites can outcompete Reddit and big brand websites

data.Title: Managing robots.txt: Google Suggests CDNs Over Root Domain
data.Description: Google's Gary Illyes presents an alternative approach to managing robots.txt rules, suggesting centralization on CDNs instead of the root domain, challenging conventional practices.

data.Title: YouTube Enhances Copyright Protection with AI-Powered Erase Song Tool
data.Description: Pretty impressive & can help resolve copyright claims w/out impacting the entire video -> YouTube updates its Erase Song tool for creators with an AI algorithm to detect and remove any copyrighted music from their videos without impacting other audio

data.Title: Google Considered Limiting AI Overviews to Own Apps, Report Says
data.Description: The idea was dangling AI overviews out there to get more iOS users to use Google directly versus Safari -> To lessen its reliance on Safari for iOS, Google considered limiting AI Overviews to its own mobile apps, but ultimately decided against such a move
